reviewText: I never had time to actually watch this show and seeing sporadic episodes just left me lost and confused. Since I got Christmas money to get this, I have developed an addiction to Fringe, and that's more than ok. I'm just sad I missed season 5 and that I have to wait to see the end. I recommend this to any sci-fi fan. Oh and Walter Bishop is my hero.

I thought this was too good to be true, but so far it is true! Price was great and everything came as it said it would. We are in season 1 now so hopefully there are no defects along the way. It came factory sealed like they said! It is awesome
It didn't take me long to be invested in the characters. Great show. I am waiting until the price drops to buy season five. All T.V. seasons are too high when they first come out
I am so addicted to this series & I am so glad to own most of it on DVD now!!
Good show.  Addicting.  Could not wait until season 5 came out so that I would have the whole series to watch.

The DVD bundle of Fringe arrived quickly. We have watched the first season so far and we don't have any issues with the quality of the audio or video. It appears the other 3 seasons should be in excellent condition based on the packaging.
Great collection.  My highest recommendation.  For viewers that were not familiar with the first seasons, this collection is a delight.
high quality from the display box right on down to the discs.  Perfect for fringe addicts!  Definitely worth the price to get to watch every episode, in order, as much as I want.
stop stop we cant stop watching this series.  one exciting event to the next.  we are not showering.  all the doors and windows are closed.  there is popcorn all over the floor.  great series.

I have wanted Fringe Series for years,each season the DVD's were too expensive but the season 1-4 box set was great with a price I could Justify. I have been trying to change over my collection to Blu-ray and these DVD set was cheaper than 2 regular DVD's at the big discount chain. Thanks. Peace. David Cooney
If you want to watch a really fascinating series this is it!!!!!!!!!  We are thoroughly enjoying this show and will be purchasing the remaining seasons when we finish watching these.
